summary.intent: Fix the diff viewer column layout in the Remediation tab by replacing flexbox with CSS Grid to prevent jumbled line numbers and +/- prefixes.
summary.outcome: Successfully implemented CSS Grid layout with 4 explicit columns (3rem, 3rem, 1.25rem, 1fr), added empty prefix span to header lines, rebuilt CSS, passed all 1216 tests and linting, and committed the changes.

repo: frontend/dist/ is gitignored as a build artifact
Project uses Biome for linting and Tailwind CSS for styling
Pre-commit hooks run tests, lint, and typecheck automatically

code.finding: CSS Grid with explicit grid-template-columns is more reliable than flexbox with min-width for fixed-column tabular layouts like diff viewers
Grid layouts require all rows to have matching number of children - header lines needed empty prefix span to match the 4-column grid structure

workflow: When switching layout systems (flexbox to grid), redundant sizing properties from the old system should be removed
Build artifacts should be regenerated after CSS changes using bun run css:build
